titles: Two letters from Vice-Admiral John Lawson and the commanders of the fleet to the Lord Mayor, Aldermen and Common-councilmen of the city of London, dated the 13th of December, 1659 from the Downes : the other the 21 instant from Gravesend.
author: Lawson, John, Sir, d. 1665.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660.
